verses.verse: The <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1492>behold,<s%> he for <S%G3739>whom<s%> you have great <S%G5368>affection<s%> is <S%G770>sick.<s%>"

But <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2036>it,<s%> he said, <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G769>sickness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G5207>Son<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> by <S%G846>it.<s%>"

<S%G5613>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G770>sick,<s%> he <S%G3306>stayed<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250%G99999>days<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>place<s%> <S%G5117>where<s%> he <S%G3303>was.<s%>

The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G3568>just<s%> <S%G2212>trying<s%> to <S%G3034>stone<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G5217>you<s%> going <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3825>again?<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3780>"Aren't<s%> <S%G1526>there<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5610>hours<s%> of <S%G2250>daylight?<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G4043>walks<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day,<s%> he <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G4350>stumble,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G991>sees<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G2889>of<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

<S%G2036>He<s%> said these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5124>that,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2257>"Our<s%> <S%G5384>friend,<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus,<s%> has fallen <S%G2837>asleep,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> I am <S%G4198>going<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G1852>awake<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out of <S%G1852>sleep.<s%>"

<S%G2532>I<s%> am <S%G5463>glad<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sakes<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> so <S%G3754>that<s%> you may <S%G4100>believe.<s%> <S%G235>Nevertheless,<s%> <S%G71>let<s%>'s go <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to his fellow <S%G4827>disciples,<s%> <S%G71>"Let<s%>'s <S%G2249><s%> <S%G71>go<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he will rise <S%G450>again<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2222>life.<s%> He who <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> will <S%G2579>still<s%> <S%G2198>live,<s%> even <S%G2579>if<s%> he <S%G599>dies.<s%>

She <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have come to <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G5207>Son,<s%> he who <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> who <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3888>consoling<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> she rose <S%G450>up<s%> quickly <S%G2532>and<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "She is <S%G5217>going<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> <S%G3754>there.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2258>was,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> she fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you would have <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3756>wouldn't<s%> <S%G599>have<s%> <S%G302>died.<s%>"

<S%G5613>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2799>weeping,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2453%G99999>Jews<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> who <S%G4905>came<s%> with <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G1438>he<s%> <S%G1690>groaned<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G5015>troubled,<s%>

<S%G5100><s%> <S%G5100>Some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1410>"Couldn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G3778>man,<s%> who <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of him <S%G2443>who<s%> was <S%G5185>blind,<s%> have <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>kept<s%> <S%G2443>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G3361>from<s%> <S%G599>dying?<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Take <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone.<s%>" <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> the <S%G79>sister<s%> of him who was <S%G2348>dead,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> by this <S%G2235>time<s%> there is a <S%G3605>stench,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he has <S%G2076>been<s%> dead four <S%G5066>days.<s%>"

<S%G3767>So<s%> they took <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> from the place <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G2348>dead<s%> man <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2749>lying.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G142>lifted<s%> <S%G507>up<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G191>listened<s%> to <S%G3450>me.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G191>listen<s%> to <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> that stands <S%G4026>around<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2443>this,<s%> that they may <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> who was <S%G2348>dead<s%> came <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G1210>with<s%> <S%G2750>wrappings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3799>face<s%> was wrapped around <S%G4019>with<s%> a <S%G4676>cloth.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3089>"Free<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let <S%G863>him<s%> <S%G5217>go.<s%>"

The chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> a <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> are <S%G4160>we<s%> <S%G3754>doing?<s%> For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4592>signs.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> we <S%G863>leave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3779>alone<s%> like <S%G3956>this,<s%> everyone will <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4514>Romans<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> take <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> our <S%G1484>nation.<s%>"

<S%G3761>nor<s%> do you <S%G1260>consider<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it is <S%G4851>advantageous<s%> for <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> should <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G622>perish.<s%>"

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G2532>also<s%> gather <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> who are scattered <S%G1287>abroad.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G3954>openly<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> from <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G1451>to<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2187>Ephraim.<s%> He <S%G1304>stayed<s%> <S%G2546>there<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> at <S%G1451>hand.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> <S%G1537>up<s%> from the <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G48>purify<s%> <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2212>they<s%> sought for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>spoke<s%> one <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> as they <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> — <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2064>he<s%> <S%G3756>isn't<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the feast at <S%G3361>all?<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1325>had<s%> <S%G1785>commanded<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he <S%G2076>was,<s%> he should <S%G3377>report<s%> <S%G3704>it,<s%> that they might <S%G4084>seize<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
